rules.title: Medicare Advantage and Part D Final Rule

keyChanges.description: MA benchmark rates updated reflecting market trends and coding intensity adjustments
New Star Ratings measures added for health equity and social determinants of health
Enhanced requirements for Provider Directory API and expanded FHIR-based data exchange standards
Enhanced requirements for marketing materials and third-party marketing organizations
Updated time and distance standards for specialist access

rules.summary: The CY 2026 MA and Part D Final Rule includes significant updates to quality measures, interoperability requirements, marketing regulations, and payment methodologies.

rules.title: Medicare Advantage and Part D Final Rule

keyChanges.description: MA rates increased by 3.70% with additional risk adjustment changes
Updated Star Ratings methodology with health equity reward factor
Implementation of Inflation Reduction Act provisions including $2,000 out-of-pocket cap
New Patient Access API and Provider Directory API implementation requirements with HL7 FHIR standards
New requirements for electronic prior authorization and real-time decisions

rules.summary: The CY 2025 rule implements major Part D redesign provisions, API interoperability requirements, and continues quality measure evolution.

rules.title: Medicare Advantage and Part D Final Rule

keyChanges.description: MA benchmark rates updated with 1.03% increase
Continued phase-in of updated Star Ratings measures
Expansion of Patient Access API requirements to include claims and encounter data
Expanded flexibility for primarily health-related supplemental benefits
New oversight requirements for agent/broker compensation structures

rules.summary: The CY 2024 rule focused on payment rate updates, API data expansion, and continued growth of supplemental benefits.

rules.title: Medicare Advantage and Part D Final Rule

keyChanges.description: MA benchmark rates increased by 8.5% to reflect utilization trends
Initial implementation of Interoperability and Patient Access Final Rule requirements
Introduction of health equity index in Star Ratings
Updated network adequacy criteria for behavioral health providers

rules.summary: The CY 2023 rule marked the beginning of comprehensive interoperability requirements and health equity focus in quality measurement.

rules.title: Physician Fee Schedule Final Rule

keyChanges.description: Updated conversion factor reflecting budget neutrality and statutory adjustments
Enhanced API requirements for clinical data exchange using USCDI v4 standards
Extension and expansion of telehealth services coverage
Continued refinements to evaluation and management coding guidelines

rules.summary: The CY 2026 PFS proposes updates to payment rates, interoperability standards, and telehealth policies.

rules.title: Physician Fee Schedule Final Rule

keyChanges.description: Conversion factor set at $32.35, reflecting 2.8% decrease from 2024
Implementation of USCDI v3 for electronic health information exchange
Extended telehealth flexibilities through 2025
New care management services and remote therapeutic monitoring codes

rules.summary: The CY 2025 PFS includes conversion factor adjustment, enhanced interoperability standards, and continued telehealth expansion.

rules.title: Physician Fee Schedule Final Rule

keyChanges.description: Conversion factor updated to $33.29 with 1.25% increase
Adoption of USCDI v2 standards for health information exchange
Continuation of COVID-19 telehealth flexibilities
Split/shared visit documentation requirements clarified

rules.summary: The CY 2024 PFS focused on payment updates, USCDI v2 adoption, and telehealth policy continuation.

rules.title: Outpatient Prospective Payment System Final Rule

keyChanges.description: 2.6% payment rate update for hospital outpatient services
Ambulatory Surgical Center payment rate updates
New requirements for real-time benefit verification APIs and prior authorization automation
Continued adjustments to 340B drug payment policies

rules.summary: The CY 2025 OPPS rule updates payment rates, introduces prior authorization API requirements, and continues 340B policy evolution.

rules.title: Outpatient Prospective Payment System Final Rule

keyChanges.description: 2.8% payment rate increase for hospital outpatient departments
ASC payment rate increase of 3.1%
Implementation of electronic prior authorization API requirements
Payment adjustments for 340B-acquired drugs

rules.summary: The CY 2024 OPPS rule provided payment increases and initiated prior authorization API implementation.

rules.title: Inpatient Prospective Payment System Final Rule

keyChanges.description: 3.1% market basket update for inpatient services
Expanded ADT (Admission, Discharge, Transfer) notification requirements via HL7 FHIR
Updates to Hospital Inpatient Quality Reporting (IQR) Program measures
Updates to wage index and geographic reclassifications

rules.summary: The FY 2025 IPPS rule includes payment updates, enhanced interoperability through ADT notifications, and quality program changes.

rules.title: Home Health Prospective Payment System Final Rule

keyChanges.description: Home health payment rates updated with 2.7% increase
New requirements for electronic data exchange with hospitals and physicians using FHIR standards
Home Health Value-Based Purchasing Model updates
Updates to PDGM case-mix weights and behavioral adjustments

rules.summary: The CY 2025 Home Health PPS rule updates payment rates, mandates FHIR-based data exchange, and refines value-based purchasing.
